title: Aw fak ru Pathian Beramno
lyrics:
Aw fak r'u, Pathian Beramno,
Kalvari-a thi kha;
Nangmah leh keimah min tlan nan,
A thisen a chhuak ta.

Thisenin, thisenin,
Min tlan ta, Beramno thisenin;
Min tlan ta, min tlan ta,
Beramno, Haleluia! Fak r'u.

Aw, Lalpa hmangaih ropui chu,
A hausak ren rual loh;
Sang tam tak a pe tawh, kei pawh
Malsawmna chu min pe.

Haleluia! Ropuina chu,
Amannei kumkhua se;
Khawvel sual leh kei chu Kristan
Thisen hlu chuan min tlan.
